name: Epitome
description:
Caused by a dark magician invasion at White Wizard Domains Temple, and the destruction of the white mage's orb catalyst, the Linit region has been struck by a global absence of light.

Frizz sets out on a journey to help his people.

In this game, you can explore a vast world filled with puzzles, and solve intricate light related mysteries awaiting hidden.
Find out what happened, and restore the light of the world.
